message: I don't eat one food on this list. I'm happy to say.

Yes, but in the article it says she was having a surgery on her cervix not a procedure on her colon. And this is Japan afterall. I believe this is one of those need more information situations as the article is very vague on details.

If a truck/tanker wrecks small cleanup. If a train derails and a car or so leaks, small cleanup compared to a ruptured pipeline that destroys our ecosystem and aquifers. Wake up before it's too late. The only one to benefit and take the least amount of risk is Canada. What did we do to Canada that they want to destroy a part of America?

Tranquilizers do no work instantly like in the movies. Just being shot with the dart could cause the Gorilla to defend itself. The zoo can't take that chance. Yes, it's the parents fault, but the zoo made the only decision they could to safely remove the child. And for all of you who say the Gorilla had every right to live as the child, think if it was your kid and grow the hell up. It's sad all around.

I understand the child needed to be saved, but when an endangered animal has to be executed, shouldn't someone be responsible?!! If you're not watching your child and he in turn, causes major damage to property of any sort...typically someone would be held responsible ....but there is no price to the loss of an endagered animal? There is negligence here somewhere! At the very least, changes need to be made to prevent this from ever happening!

Why are so many here comparing themselves to children? A delayed school opening and calling in late to your job are two completely different things. A child is not going to be destined to a lazy life cause of a delayed opening. Calling a kid weak and lazy is pretty low if you ask me. I dont thing you look tough trying to one up a child. Grow up and worry about your own life. And we dont need to keep hearing about how you walked up hill both ways in a blizzard every day when you were in school.
And your dad raised and ignorant piece of trash !!! What a waste
